Interface FormSettingsWithOptions<T extends FormOption<V>,V>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    WithFormFieldName, WithFormOptions<T,V>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BucketRangeFacetedSearchFormSettings<T>, EntriesPerPageFormSettings, SortFormSettings<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFormSettingsWithOptions, ProductSortFormSettings, ProductsPerPageFormSettings

    public interface FormSettingsWithOptions<T extends FormOption<V>,V>
extends WithFormFieldName, WithFormOptions<T,V>

    • Method Summary

      Finds all selected valid options for this form in the HTTP request.
      default java.util.Optional<T> getSelectedOption(play.mvc.Http.Context httpContext)

    • Method Detail

      • getAllSelectedOptions

        default java.util.List<T> getAllSelectedOptions(play.mvc.Http.Context httpContext)
        Finds all selected valid options for this form in the HTTP request.
        Parameters:
        httpContext - current HTTP context
        Returns:
        a list of valid selected options for this form

      • getSelectedOption

        default java.util.Optional<T> getSelectedOption(play.mvc.Http.Context httpContext)
        Finds one selected valid option for this form in the HTTP request. If many valid values are selected, which one is going to be returned is non-deterministic.
        Parameters:
        httpContext - current HTTP context
        Returns:
        a valid selected option for this form, or empty if no valid option is selected
